content.en: Pacemaker optimization: Scientists have been investigating how algorithms can optimize the performance of pacemakers. They have explored questions such as whether combining two sensors in a pacemaker can improve its rate responsiveness, if automatically optimized pacemakers can enhance rate performance, and how new and combined sensors can improve adaptive-rate pacing. The research shows that algorithms play a crucial role in adjusting the behavior of pacemakers to meet the needs of patients during different activities and conditions.
content.da: Pacemaker-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere ydeevnen af pacemakere. De har undersøgt spørgsmål som, om kombination af to sensorer i en pacemaker kan forbedre dens rate-respons, om automatisk optimerede pacemakere kan forbedre rate-ydelsen, og hvordan nye og kombinerede sensorer kan forbedre adaptiv-rate pacing. Forskningen viser, at algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at justere pacemakernes adfærd for at imødekomme patienternes behov under forskellige aktiviteter og tilstande.
